segments.text: I wonder what we should have for dinner this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . I really don't feel much like cooking , but the family must eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you know me . I can always eat pizza , or spaghetti .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I've noticed . You're putting on a little weight , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Don't remind me . I'm starting a new diet the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
